attributes.action: People working to benefit us MUST RECEIVE TAX-FREE INCOME & A TAX-FREE BONUS
attributes.additional_details: People working in key posts to the benefit of others - us - at increased risk to their own wellbeing, deserve to be compensated very substantially for coming together when required and putting in great effort to ensure the best possible service is provided to us.
attributes.background:
We rely on many of the people working in key jobs to provide a service on a daily basis.
THEY MUST BE REWARDED AND SHOULD RECEIVE: 
- A FULL YEAR FREE OF ALL PAYE INCOME TAX PLUS 
- A SUBSTANTIAL TAX-FREE BONUS

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
